Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using HEK293 cells stably expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S variant showed increased LRRK2 kinase activity compared to wild-type.
R1441C variant exhibited reduced LRRK2 kinase activity and altered protein stability.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for all experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LRRK2 kinase activity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LRRK2 kinase activity deviating by more than 20% from wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: Co-immunoprecipitation experiments were performed in HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S variant showed increased interaction with Rab10 compared to wild-type.
R1441C variant exhibited reduced interaction with Rab10 and increased interaction with 14-3-3 proteins.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for all experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Interaction with Rab10 within 15% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Interaction with Rab10 deviating by more than 30% from wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: Immunofluorescence experiments were performed in SH-SY5Y cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S variant showed increased LRRK2 aggregation in neuronal cells.
R1441C variant exhibited reduced LRRK2 aggregation and increased cytoplasmic localization.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for all experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LRRK2 localization predominantly in the cytoplasm with minimal aggregates.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LRRK2 localization with >50% cytoplasmic aggregates or nuclear accumulation.
